title: Returning Injury: A Suspense Celebrating Women's Strength
description: Rebecca is happily married, loves her career, but she has one huge problemâ€”a stalker. Home alone, and feeling like she's going crazy, she has to learn how to take back her life and regain her strength. Will Rebecca ever feel safe again and stop living in fear? Can she protect herself? Is she going to lose her mind... or her life?
author: Becky Due
